nodes.text: Phorliss was a planet in the Dolomar sector of the Core Worlds that could support almost any kind of life.
During the Galactic War, the houks from Lijuter immigrated to Phorliss.
After the Battle of Endor, Mara Jade briefly used the aliases Karrinna Jansih and Chiara Lorn to work in a Phorliss cantina as a serving girl.
